title: Blue Essence Orb Not Showing in Loot?
body:
Hello everyone! 

I just completed a game in order to get some quests done. It said I completed four, one of which being the blue essence orb quest for the 60,000 essence. It said that I acquired the orb, but it does not show in my inventory. Is this a bug that is going around? I know some people were having issues opening them, but I just haven't received mine from completing the quest yet. Do I need to make a ticket or wait it out? 

Thank you in advance for taking the time to read! 
<3 Aelthya

replies.body: for me it doesn't show the orb in my loot, even after logging several times. Is there any other creative solution? I have that issue both on EUNE and EUW.
Could definitely be a syncing issue with notifications.  Glad everything is okay now!
Nevermind. Relogging, as I saw in one of the threads, actually fixes it. Bug, perhaps?
